text: Ilaria Sanguineti (born 15 April 1994) is an Italian professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's Continental Team . ==Major results== ;2012 : 2nd Time trial, National Junior Road Championships ;2015 : 1st Overall Tour de Bretagne Féminin ::1st Young rider classification ::1st Stage 1 : 2nd Road race, UEC European Under-23 Road Championships ;2016 : 1st Stage 4 Tour de Bretagne Féminin ;2017 : 1st Stage 1 (TTT) Setmana Ciclista Valenciana ;2018 : 1st 20px Points classification Madrid Challenge by La Vuelta : 8th Tour of Guangxi ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female cyclists Category:People from Sanremo
title: Ilaria Sanguineti
